title: Windows 11 Notepad finally gets spellcheck and autocorrect
description: Microsoft continues to add new features to the Windows Notepad, today announcing a preview release with built-in spellchecking and an autocorrect feature. [...]

title: KDE advises extreme caution after theme wipes Linux user's files
description: On Wednesday, the KDE team warned Linux users to exercise "extreme caution" when installing global themes, even from the official KDE Store, because these themes run arbitrary code on devices to customize the desktop's appearance. [...]

title: Unsaflok flaw can let hackers unlock millions of hotel doors
description: Security vulnerabilities in over 3 million Saflok electronic RFID locks deployed in 13,000 hotels and homes worldwide allowed researchers to easily unlock any door in a hotel by forging a pair of keycards. [...]

title: Evasive Sign1 malware campaign infects 39,000 WordPress sites
description: A previously unknown malware campaign called Sign1 has infected over 39,000 websites over the past six months, causing visitors to see unwanted redirects and popup ads. [...]

title: Exploit released for Fortinet RCE bug used in attacks, patch now
description: Security researchers have released a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for a critical vulnerability in Fortinet's FortiClient Enterprise Management Server (EMS) software, which is now actively exploited in attacks. [...]

title: What the Latest Ransomware Attacks Teach About Defending Networks
description: Recent ransomware attacks have shared valuable lessons on how to limit risk to your own networks. Learn from Blink Ops about how organizations can limit their ransomware risk. [...]

title: Microsoft confirms Windows Server issue behind domain controller crashes
description: Microsoft confirmed that a memory leak introduced with the March 2024 Windows Server security updates is behind a widespread issue causing Windows domain controllers to crash. [...]

description: The Syslog message format is used by many applications and is associated with the Linux operating system. Discover the best free Syslog servers. [...]

title: The best RMM software

title: Windows 11, Tesla, and Ubuntu Linux hacked at Pwn2Own Vancouver
description: On the first day of Pwn2Own Vancouver 2024, contestants demoed Windows 11, Tesla, and Ubuntu Linux zero-day vulnerabilities and exploit chains to win $732,500 and a Tesla Model 3 car. [...]
